mapper.select: SELECT A.ADMIN_SEQ AS adminSeq , AM.MENU_SEQ AS menuSeq , 'ROLE_ADMIN' AS memberRole FROM ADMIN_INFO A, ADMIN_MENU AM, MENU_INFO M WHERE A.ADMIN_SEQ = AM.ADMIN_SEQ AND AM.MENU_SEQ = M.MENU_SEQ
SELECT member_seq AS memberSeq , member_id AS memberId , member_nm AS memberNm , member_birthday AS memberBirthday , 'ROLE_MEMBER' AS memberRole FROM MEMBERS WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{id}
